name: Akashi Kaikyo Bridge (Japan) - Main Span Section
description: 1991 m main span suspension bridge; longest main span worldwide; complex cable & deck system
reference_sources: Nagarajaiah & Narasimhan 2006: Seismic Response & Aerodynamic Performance (EQ Spec Isol Damp)
Wind tunnel studies and published modal data
expected_outputs: Cable tension distribution along deck (compare to measured)
Wind-induced flutter derivatives and aeroelastic stability
notes: Cable stiffness and geometric nonlinearity (sag & tension) critical; wind flutter is key validation
